name: FOSSawesome Games
tagline: A List of all things Games and Open Source
body:
### Welcome to FOSSawesome Games.
This is a list of all found (by this repo's maintainters) Open Source Games, Game Engines, Game Tools, and all other things relating to both Games and Open Source. To be included on this list, the thing at hand (Game, Game Engine, Game Tool, etc.) MUST have an [Open Source Initiative (OSI) approved license](http://opensource.org/licenses/alphabetical).

###The List
Need a list here.

###Want to Help?
This webpage is openly maintained and added to by anyone on Github.com [the GitHub.com repo](https://github.com/ajman1101/FOSSawesome-Games) Any and all are welcome to contribute, though your patch will be checked to ensure it follows the above stated guidelines.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
